steps: Contact your Patient Advocate at your local VA Medical Center
Explain your concern - Patient Advocates listen to questions, problems, or special needs
The Patient Advocate will refer your concern to appropriate Medical Center staff for resolution
If you're not satisfied, you can file a formal complaint through the VA's PATS (Patient Advocate Tracking System)
You may also submit feedback through the Ask VA portal at Ask.VA.gov
For urgent matters, you can reach Patient Advocates through MyHealtheVet Secure Messaging
